price: ¿Es que no saben que Dios conoce lo que ocultan y lo que hacen público?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
